SEARCH
Module com.example.cincuentazo
Package com.example.cincuentazo.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cincuentazo.controllers.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controller for the game view in the "CINCUENTAZO" game. Manages the gameplay logic, user interactions, and updates the game interface.
Author:
Laura Celeste Berrio - Leonardo Rios Saavedra

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()

  • Method Details

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame(int machinesNumber)
      Initializes a new game with the specified number of machine players. Updates the game interface and sets up event handlers for user interactions.
      Parameters:
      machinesNumber - The number of machine players (1-3).

    • optionCardAs

      public void optionCardAs(Card playedCard)
      Handles the behavior when the "As" card is played.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card being played

    • hideMachinesDeck

      public void hideMachinesDeck(int machinesNumber)
      Hides the decks of machines based on the number of machines in the game.
      Parameters:
      machinesNumber - the number of machines currently in the game

    • playMachineTurn

      public void playMachineTurn() throws InterruptedException
      Handles the logic for a machine's turn during the game. This includes card selection, validation, and updating the game state.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while simulating delays

    • removeCurrentPlayerIfNoValidCards

      public void removeCurrentPlayerIfNoValidCards()
      Automatically validates whether the current player has valid cards to play. If no valid cards are available, the player either loses or wins based on the game state.

    • onHandleInstructionsButton

      public void onHandleInstructionsButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
